dcterms:creator: Alberto Caprara
Matteo Fischetti
Paolo Toth
dcterms:description: The Train Dispatching Problem (TD) is a real-time variant of the Train Timetabling problem, focusing on rearranging trains on a network after disruptions to minimize delays.
dcterms:title: Train Dispatching Problem (TD)

dcterms:creator: Harshad Khadilkar
dcterms:description: The Linear Q-learning Algorithm Dataset is used to compare the performance of deep reinforcement learning methods against a classical linear Q-learning approach for scheduling railway lines.
dcterms:title: Linear Q-learning Algorithm Dataset
